column4: Anybody else able to help with my lacking of the ability to click? 10.4, ran 9.10 via dual boot, and it hasn't ever given me this problem before (te installw as on an external)
it says by-id  by-path  event0  event1  event2  event3  event4  mice  mouse0  mouse1
by the way, on my Ubuntu system (your mileage may vary)...
okay, mouse0 did nothing, but mouse1 threw up a munch of jargen
good. now, when you go back to the test, try just clicking each button. If you get data, then I'll send you on to the next test.
yeah it did put code up.
start xev, click buttons again (don't forget to put the pointer INTO that white window first)
well it looks like it was registering my clicks, right and left
ah. Then you need to look somewhere else, i.e. the window manager. Try kde instead, see if mouseclicks work there
